replies.body: Can't make any promises yet, but we are trying to get that in.
Can we do it for Velkoz as well and make another custom announcer quote for Azir's Sun Disc?

could have azir make a global quote, like when {{champion:429}} soul bounds someone.
{{champion:268}}: "All things vanish, admits the sands of time"
{{champion:268}}: "My tower my fall, but SHURIMA will endure"
{{champion:268}}: "IT CRUMBLES BEFORE SHURIMA'S GLORY"
Oh please no! Azir's the one champion I have to disable champion quotes on when I play, I don't want to have to do that when an ally or enemy plays him as well!
I suddenly feel the need to hire azir's voice actor to go stand in front of your window with a megaphone and yell 'YOU CANNOT SILENCE SHURIMA!'
If you're actually doing that, could you please also have the announcer saying custom lines for Azir's Sun Disk Turrets (upon self-destruct or player destructing it)?
Tears appear to serve no function...
An enemy has been {{champion:50}} .  Nuff said.
SHE WONT BE GETTING ANY ON MY WATCH {{champion:111}}

> [{quoted}](name=ApocTheLypse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JJJvNcjL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-12T02:28:54.018+0000)
>
> SHE WONT BE GETTING ANY ON MY WATCH {{champion:111}}

Oh yeah, I guess she might get an interaction with Nautilus.
